div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

tr.td: The player of the role is a male who begets or raises or nurtures the scoping entity (child).
The player of the role is a female who conceives, gives birth to, or raises and nurtures the scoping entity (child).
The player of the role is a male sharing one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.
The player of the role is a female sharing one or both parents in common with the scoping entity.
The player of the role is a male related to the scoping entity by sharing only one biological parent.
The player of the role is a female related to the scoping entity by sharing only one biological parent.
The scoper and player are offspring of the same egg-sperm pair.
The scoper and player were carried in the same womb and share common biological parents but are the product of distinct egg/sperm pairs.
**Description:** The player of the role is a male child (of any type) of scoping entity (parent)
**Description:**The player of the role is a biological sister of the scoping person's biological mother.
**Description:**The player of the role is a biological sister of the scoping person's biological father.
**Description:**The player of the role is a biological brother of the scoping person's biological mother.
**Description:**The player of the role is a biological brother of the scoping person's biological father.

**Description:**The player of the role is a biological relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor on the player's mother's side, such as a grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.

**Description:**The player of the role is a biological relative of the scoping person descended from a common ancestor on the player's father's side, such as a grandparent, by two or more steps in a diverging line.
**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological mother.
**Description:**The player of the role is the biological father of the scoping person's biological father.
**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological mother.
**Description:**The player of the role is the biological mother of the scoping person's biological father.
The player of the role is a son of the scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the scoping person's spouse.
The player of the role is a daughter of the scoping person's brother or sister or of the brother or sister of the scoping person's spouse.
This value is indicated if the position of the member in the maternal branch is unknown
This value is indicated if the position of the member in the paternal branch is unknown

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on Ethnicites in Quebec v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Descendants of the First Nations of the St. Lawrence Valley
Anyone from or whose ancestors originate from the European continent (excluding French Canadians).
Person belonging to ethnic group with total or partial ancestry from any of the black racial groups of Africa.
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from Latin America
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from east and southeast asia
Canadian or Quebecois who are descendants of people from south asia
Person who are descendants of the natives or the indigenous peoples of the Americas
Individual descending from more than one ethnic group

description.value: Classification og people living in Quebec in a named category of humans sharing a common history, geographic origin or nationality. The ethnic codes used to represent these concepts are based on a list provided by the genomic sequencing center

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on observation code v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Clinical summary with all the investigations carried out in the context of the patient's pathology
Clinical sign observed in the patient - reported by the doctor following the physical examination or questioning of the patient

description.value: Codes of observations in our system

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on service request code v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Process of determining the complete DNA sequence of the genome at a single time
Process of determining all of the exons within the genome sequence at a single time
Process of determining the complete sequences of the indicated gene panel at a single time

description.value: Codes of service request in our system

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on Blood relationship v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Consanguinity relationship of the patient's parents
No consanguinity relationship of the patient's parents
Inbreeding relationship unknown to the patient's parents

description.value: This field gives us information if the parents of the patient are inbred

p.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

div.p: Expansion based on Family structure code system v0.1.0 (CodeSystem)

tr.td: Family with only one member (proband alone)

description.value: This field gives possible valueSet of the family structure

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

tr.td: An organization that provides healthcare services.
A department or ward within a hospital (Generally is not applicable to top level organizations)
Other type of organization not already specified.
Laboratory that processes the sample sent by medical service

div.style: border: black 1px dotted; background-color: #EEEEEE; padding: 8px; margin-bottom: 8px

tr.td: The request has been created but is not yet complete or ready for action.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been temporarily withdrawn but is expected to resume in the future.
The request (and any implicit authorization to act) has been terminated prior to the known full completion of the intended actions. No further activity should occur.
The activity described by the request has been fully performed. No further activity will occur.
The request that was submitted by the doctor is accepted by the diagnostic laboratory
The files resulting from the sequencing of the genetic material contained in the sample are available

After sequencing, the list of variants is analyzed by geneticists and some mutations have been selected to be included in the final report, which will be edited after the multidisciplinary consultation meeting
